main event: On March 17, 1956, at Folsom Prison, California, a wing-shaped object the size of a B-29 aircraft, black in color with red and white lights, emitted a jet-like noise. It made one orbit over the prison before heading northwest and then faded from sight after four minutes.
interesting points: The object emitted a jet-like noise and was approximately the size of a B-29 aircraft.
The prisoners initially thought it to be a flying wing.
The object came from the southeast and made one orbit over the prison before heading northwest.
The sighting was reported to have lasted approximately four minutes in total.
The report suggests that the object faded from sight, indicating a potential mysterious disappearance.
sighted object: a wing-shaped object with red and white lights
